title: Ten Little Gall Force
synopsis: A super deformed parody which depicts the "making of " Eternal Story and Destruction. A very humorous behind-the-scenes look (if "Gall Force" were a live-action series instead of being animated).
related_anime: ['Scramble Wars: Tsuppashire! Genom Trophy Rally', 'Gall Force 1: Eternal Story']
voices: ['Tsuru, Hiromi', 'Watanabe, Naoko', 'Matsui, Naoko', 'Yamamoto, Yuriko', 'Hara, Eriko', 'Kawamura, Maria']
